column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Everything was excellent! Wonderful
column2: generous size meals at reasonable prices.  We couldn't decide between so many appealing choices so we shared the spicy Los Altos Eggs Benedict
column3: Bacon Chicken Walnut Berry Spinach Salad
column4: & Wholewheat Berry Crepes.  An iced chai tea and iced black currant iced tea. All were exceptional! We would probably order all this again
column5: it was so delish! The patio was very nice too. My new favorite lunch/breakfast!
